description:
Sonoko`s acquaintance Chikada Eimi has her hair cut by someone at high school. Three days earlier and the day before, other students were the victims similar incidents. Before the incidents, warning letters were left in the box of Club Orihime, the romantic help desk Eimi and her friends set up at the school. This morning they received a letter stating, "EC will be brought to justice!" The letters are the initials of the victim. At the scene of the crime, they find a new letter stating, "TB dies as sundown tonight!" Only two hours remain until sunset. To prevent another incident from occurring, Conan and his friends search for a student with the initials TB...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 織り姫クラブへようこそ
